text: "Sunday, Cruddy Sunday" is the twelfth episode of the tenth season of The Simpsons. It first aired on January 31, 1999, after Super Bowl XXXIII. The episode was directed by Steven Dean Moore and written by Brian Scully, Tom Martin, Mike Scully and George Meyer. The episode features Homer offers a free bus ride, going to Super Bowl, but soon face many problems. == Other websites == * Category:1999 television episodes
title: Sunday, Cruddy Sunday
